column6: Matt Murdock finally comes face-to-face with the person who's been manipulating his life since he was thrown in jail, and you'll be stunned by the revelation!
column8: | penciller (cover):Lee Bermejo | writer:Ed Brubaker | inker:Stefano Gaudiano | colorist:Matt Hollingsworth | penciller:Michael Lark | letterer:Cory Petit
